title: An unhandled win32 exception occured in rads_user_kernel.exe [32]
body:
Today i started league to play some league before the end of the season when i came across this problem.

Visual Studio Just-In-time Debugger
An unhandled win32 exception occurred in rads_user_kernel.exe [32].
Possible Debuggers:
- New instance of microsoft Visual Studio 2015
Options:
- Set the currently selected debugger as the default.
- Manually choose the debugging engines
Do you want to debug using the selected debugger?
- Yes/No

Please Help.
{{champion:238}}

replies.body:
Hi,

At what point do you see this error?  Logging in? In champ select? During game?

As a first step, you might want to check out these articles on the support site (depending on when the issue happens):

* [Bug Splat and Game Crashes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)
* [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)

Cheers
Mindstar
It happens right at startup. I double-clicked on the icon from home page and the error showed along with the league of legends icon.

I have the same issue. Installed Unity last night, and now LoL doesn't work. When I open the game the League of Legends logo appears, then goes grey. It says "PvP.net Patcher has stopped working". Once I hit debug it says exactly what OP posted. Any ideas for a solution?
